name: Romance Rescue!
description:
DO ALL SOULMATES END UP TOGETHER?

In Romance Rescue! you'll discover the answer to this very question.

Master the flight stick of the Lovecopter and help Loverboy unite all the worlds lost lovers... with the power of love! <3

Made for FuseJam 2020 - https://fusejam.games/

Credits: Jake Gaule, Bryn Findlay-Dykes, Rhys Davies, Tamara Osborn
